job_details.Vacaturetitel: Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_details.full_text:
Artificial Intelligence Engineer, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD

This is not a position for those who prefer to specialize in a single aspect of development. We're looking for innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product. Your work will directly impact thousands of students, ensuring that our tools meet their needs and set new standards for educational technology., * Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
     * Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
     * Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products. You'll work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs and push the boundaries of what's possible.
     * Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
     * Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Narrow AI Development: You won't be working on isolated AI features that don't integrate with the overall product strategy. Your work will have a direct impact on thousands of students.
     * Surface-Level Coding: This is not a role for those who focus only on either front-end or back-end development. You will be expected to integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
     * Routine Maintenance: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
     * Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
     * Working in Isolation: You won't be coding in a vacuum. Collaboration with other developers, product managers, and educational experts is key to ensuring that the solutions you build are impactful and user-centered., Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.

job_profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes working with LLMs like GPT-4 and Claude to create autonomous tools and interactive features, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer. The focus on developing user-facing AI-powered web applications and integrating AI across front-end and back-end systems further supports this classification.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop AI-Powered Web Applications: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the development of applications, including front-end and back-end integration, which is a core aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment and Innovate with AI: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions working with LLMs (GPT-4, Claude) and creating AI-powered tools, which falls under the modeling category, particularly generative AI.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'taking ownership of the entire product' implies responsibility for the full lifecycle, including deployment and maintenance, which is a key aspect of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of AI capabilities into existing or new software architectures, spanning both user interface and server-side logic.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle, including planning, building, and deploying.

job_tasks.phrase: ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates an understanding of the end-users' requirements and aligning technical solutions with those needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts. Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with a diverse team and the need for effective communication of complex ideas.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the importance of continuous learning and adapting to new technologies in a fast-paced field.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the full scope of software development, from ideation to deployment and iteration.

job_tasks.phrase: create autonomous tools and interactive features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase points to the development of AI-driven functionalities that operate independently or interactively with users.

job_tasks.phrase: integrate both, creating comprehensive and scalable solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes the integration of different development aspects (front-end/back-end) to build robust solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of taking high-level concepts and building complete software products, requiring full-stack development skills.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the creation and deployment of applications powered by AI, focusing on user experience.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the architectural design and coding of web applications, involving both client-side and server-side development.

soft_skills.phrase: innovative thinkers who can seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems, taking ownership of the entire product.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights the need for innovative thinking and taking full responsibility for the product's development and success.

soft_skills.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase emphasizes taking initiative and responsibility for the complete project lifecycle.

soft_skills.phrase: Continuous Improvement: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.

soft_skills.phrase: Waiting for Detailed Specifications: You won't be handed fully fleshed-out requirements. Instead, you will take high-level ideas and translate them into fully developed products, leveraging your expertise in AI and full-stack development.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase indicates a need to translate abstract ideas into concrete products, requiring problem-solving and a pragmatic approach to development.

soft_skills.phrase: This role is not about maintaining legacy systems or making minor updates. You will be driving innovation and building new, cutting-edge applications.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase highlights a proactive and forward-thinking approach focused on building new, innovative solutions.
